mapper.sql: ttf_id, djxh, ttf_fpdm, ttf_fphm, ttf_gf_nsrsbh, ttfk_xf_nsrsbh, ttfk_je, ttfk_se, ttfk_sl, ttfk_fp_kprq, ttfk_zfbz, ttfk_bdbz, ttfk_qy_mc
mapper.update: update t_tax_fp_kzxx set ttf_fpdm = #{ttfFpdm}, ttf_fphm = #{ttfFphm}, ttf_gf_nsrsbh = #{ttfGfNsrsbh}, ttfk_xf_nsrsbh = #{ttfkXfNsrsbh}, ttfk_je = #{ttfkJe}, ttfk_se = #{ttfkSe}, ttfk_sl = #{ttfkSl}, ttfk_fp_kprq = #{ttfkFpKprq}, ttfk_zfbz = #{ttfkZfbz}, ttfk_bdbz = #{ttfkBdbz}, ttfk_qy_mc = #{ttfkQyMc} where ttf_id = #{id}
